site_name: NATURAL HISTORY EDUCATION CO OF MIDSOUTH

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:20 AM-10:40 AM
on Feb. 7, 2023.
The gate was closed. Calls went to voice mail. Texts were sent and replies received stated licensees were not available.
End Section
